original_text: Then came all the princes unto Jeremiah, and asked him: and he told them according to all these words that the king had commanded. So they left off speaking with him; for the matter was not perceived.
korean_text: 모든 고관이 예레미야에게 와서 물으매 그가 왕이 명령한 모든 말대로 대답하였으므로 일이 탄로되지 아니하였고 그들은 그와 더불어 말하기를 그쳤더라

sentences.original_text: Then came all the princes unto Jeremiah
and he told them according to all these words
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들에게 이 모든 말씀대로 말하니

sentences.original_text: So they left off speaking with him
for the matter was not perceived
